headline: Compared to Estimates, Extra Space Storage (EXR) Q4 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Extra Space Storage (EXR) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended December 2024, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: Extra Space Storage (EXR) Beats Q4 FFO Estimates
summary: Extra Space Storage (EXR) delivered FFO and revenue surprises of 0.50% and 1.16%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Extra Space Storage (EXR) Beats Q4 FFO Estimates
raw.summary: Extra Space Storage (EXR) delivered FFO and revenue surprises of 0.50% and 1.16%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Extra Space Storage: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The Salt Lake City-based real estate investment trust said it had funds from operations of $450.2 million, or $2.03 per share, in the period. The average estimate of nine analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for funds from operations of $2.02 per share. Funds from operations is a closely watched measure in the REIT industry.

headline: Extra Space Storage Inc. Reports 2024 Fourth Quarter and Year-End Results
summary: Extra Space Storage Inc. (NYSE: EXR) (the "Company"), a leading owner and operator of self-storage facilities in the United States and a constituent of the S&P 500, announced operating results for the three months and year ended December 31, 2024.

headline: Extra Space Storage forecasts annual FFO below expectations amid tough macroeconomic conditions
summary: Extra Space Storage forecast on Tuesday its annual funds from operations below Wall Street expectations, as the company grapples with a challenging macro environment amid high interest rates. ...
